As director of Metropolitan Opportunity at the Ford Foundation , McCarthy supported collaborative regional efforts to overcome the social , economic and spatial isolation of disadvantaged populations living in and around metropolitan areas worldwide .

RelatedSentence: He has worked as professor of economics at Bard College ; resident scholar at the Jerome Levy Economics Institute ; visiting scholar and member of the High Table at King 's College of Cambridge University ; visiting scholar at the University of Naples , Italy ; and research associate at the Centre for Independent Social Research in St. Petersburg , Russia .
